name: superstring
description: A data structure to efficiently represent the results of applying patches.

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.prepublishOnly: git submodule update --init --recursive && npm run build:browser
scripts.format: clang-format -i src/core/*.cc src/core/*.h src/bindings/*.cc src/bindings/*.h src/bindings/em/*.cc src/bindings/em/*.h
scripts.tidy: clang-tidy src/core/*.cc src/core/*.h src/bindings/*.cc src/bindings/*.h src/bindings/em/*.cc src/bindings/em/*.h

author: Nathan Sobo <nathan@github.com>
